# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. We believe its value far exceeds $1200000 to us, reflecting its unique qualities and the dedication of our team. Considering its immense worth, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. This is an opportunity to acquire a masterpiece that could significantly enhance your collection or operations. We would be honored to have you as a distinguished owner of this remarkable product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,500,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,500,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
